source_documents.type: IFP Gotham Awards 2017 - Al Gore tribute

peggy_siegal_pr_network.identity: Peggy Siegal - Top Hollywood publicist, 'PR Doyenne'
peggy_siegal_pr_network.role: Organized social events for Epstein post-conviction, connected him to celebrities

key_activities.details: 120 friends and their children attended at Epstein's home - months after prison release
key_activities.source: Daily Beast article referenced in HOUSE_OVERSIGHT_031691

key_activities.action: Epstein asks Peggy to contact Arianna Huffington to attack Virginia Roberts
key_activities.quote: should you point out to Ariana Huff, that the same type of person, same as strauss Kahn is Andrews accuser, long criminal record. total liar

key_activities.action: Epstein claims victim can be 'proven to be a liar'
key_activities.quote: I promise you she is a fraud. you and i will be able to go to ascot for the rest of our lives

key_activities.action: Still arranging Epstein attendance at IFP Gotham Awards honoring Al Gore
key_activities.quote: Jeffrey; every year I beg you to come and every year you don't

tactics: Compared to DSK accuser who was 'proven to have lied'
Claimed she 'was never 15' and 'nothing more than a telephone answerer'
Mentioned she worked for Trump at Mar-a-Lago at age 15
Proposed sending HuffPost reporters to 'investigate' her

peter_mandelson_connection.identity: Peter Mandelson (Lord Mandelson) - Labour politician, European Commissioner, Blair ally
peter_mandelson_connection.context: Epstein forwarded BBC Today Programme interview request to Mandelson
peter_mandelson_connection.topic: Prince Andrew stories circulating in UK press

reputation_management_operation.goal: Clean up Epstein's Google search results
details: At time, first page showed Forbes 'Sex Offender' article, NY Post 'Billionaire pervert' piece
Woody Allen spotted with Epstein story on Daily Mail
Duke of York secret journal story in Telegraph
Shears: 'another 45 days should be enough to have a clean first page'
Foundation site was hacked during this period

bbc_interview_request_2011.requester: Kirsty MacKenzie - Interviews Editor, BBC Today Programme
bbc_interview_request_2011.topic: Stories circulating about Epstein and Prince Andrew
bbc_interview_request_2011.handling: Epstein forwarded to Peggy Siegal and Peter Mandelson
bbc_interview_request_2011.notable: BBC noted their guests included Bill Gates, Al Gore, Stephen Hawking, Tony Blair

journalist_investigation_2011.topic: Why rich people don't shun Epstein
key_questions_to_peggy: Why was your reaction to his crimes to continue being his friend?
What would he have had to do for you to shun him?
journalist_investigation_2011.referenced_article: Daily Beast: Bill Clinton, Katie Couric, Woody Allen - Jeffrey Epstein's Society Friends Close Ranks

new_entities_discovered.role: Mitchell Holdings LLC, sent Epstein Trump-Deutsche Bank article

new_entities_discovered.role: IFP, Epstein donor for Gotham Awards

new_entities_discovered.role: UK news show, requested Epstein interview 2011

key_quotes.speaker: Peggy Siegal
key_quotes.quote: I and many others that know him describe him as brilliant. His unique mind is what attracts the world's smartest people to his home

key_quotes.speaker: Jeffrey Epstein
key_quotes.quote: I promise you she is a fraud. you and i will be able to go to ascot for the rest of our lives
